flags.label: PKG_AllowDownload
flags.comment: Allow downloading package.

flags.label: PKG_ClientOptional
flags.comment: Purely optional for clients.

flags.label: PKG_ServerSideOnly
flags.comment: Only needed on the server side.

flags.label: PKG_Cooked
flags.comment: Whether this package has been cooked for the target platform.

flags.label: PKG_Unsecure
flags.comment: Not trusted.

flags.label: PKG_SavedWithNewerVersion
flags.comment: Package was saved with newer version.

flags.label: PKG_ArchetypesPackage
flags.comment: PSYONIX: Package was generated by text archetypes system (slightly different rules concerning GUID creation)

flags.label: PKG_HasAESBlock
flags.comment: PSYONIX: Steam patching, package has AES block that needs decrypting before header can be read

flags.label: PKG_StorePatchable
flags.comment: PSYONIX: PS4 patching, package has header padding but not AES encryption

flags.label: PKG_HeaderOnly
flags.comment: PSYONIX: for patching.  This file only contains the header information (none of the object data). useful for make net-compatible patches when the data isn't necessary.

flags.label: PKG_Need
flags.comment: Client needs to download this package.

flags.label: PKG_Compiling
flags.comment: package is currently being compiled

flags.label: PKG_ContainsMap
flags.comment: Set if the package contains a ULevel/ UWorld object

flags.label: PKG_Trash
flags.comment: Set if the package was loaded from the trashcan

flags.label: PKG_DisallowLazyLoading
flags.comment: Set if the archive serializing this package cannot use lazy loading

flags.label: PKG_PlayInEditor
flags.comment: Set if the package was created for the purpose of PIE

flags.label: PKG_ContainsScript
flags.comment: Package is allowed to contain UClasses and unrealscript

flags.label: PKG_ContainsDebugInfo
flags.comment: Package contains debug info (for UDebugger)

flags.label: PKG_RequireImportsAlreadyLoaded
flags.comment: Package requires all its imports to already have been loaded

flags.label: PKG_StoreCompressed
flags.comment: Package is being stored compressed, requires archive support for compression

flags.label: PKG_StoreFullyCompressed
flags.comment: Package is serialized normally, and then fully compressed after (must be decompressed before LoadPackage is called)

flags.label: PKG_ContainsFaceFXData
flags.comment: Package contains FaceFX assets and/or animsets

flags.label: PKG_NoExportAllowed
flags.comment: Package was NOT created by a modder.  Internal data not for export

flags.label: PKG_StrippedSource
flags.comment: Source has been removed to compress the package size

flags.label: PKG_FilterEditorOnly
flags.comment: Package has editor-only data filtered

flags.label: CLASS_Abstract
flags.comment: Class is abstract and can't be instantiated directly.

flags.label: CLASS_Compiled
flags.comment: Script has been compiled successfully.

flags.label: CLASS_Config
flags.comment: Load object configuration at construction time.

flags.label: CLASS_Transient
flags.comment: This object type can't be saved; null it out at save time.

flags.label: CLASS_Parsed
flags.comment: Successfully parsed.

flags.label: CLASS_Localized
flags.comment: Class contains localized text.

flags.label: CLASS_SafeReplace
flags.comment: Objects of this class can be safely replaced with default or NULL.

flags.label: CLASS_Native
flags.comment: Class is a native class - native interfaces will have CLASS_Native set, but not RF_Native

flags.label: CLASS_NoExport
flags.comment: Don't export to C++ header.

flags.label: CLASS_Placeable
flags.comment: Allow users to create in the editor.

flags.label: CLASS_PerObjectConfig
flags.comment: Handle object configuration on a per-object basis, rather than per-class.

flags.label: CLASS_NativeReplication
flags.comment: Replication handled in C++.

flags.label: CLASS_EditInlineNew
flags.comment: Class can be constructed from editinline New button.

flags.label: CLASS_CollapseCategories
flags.comment: Display properties in the editor without using categories.

flags.label: CLASS_Interface
flags.comment: Class is an interface

flags.label: CLASS_HasInstancedProps
flags.comment: Indicates that this class contains object properties which are marked 'instanced' (or editinline export).  Set by the script compiler after all properties in the class have been parsed.  Used by the loading code as an optimization to attempt to instance newly added properties only for relevant classes

flags.label: CLASS_NeedsDefProps
flags.comment: Class needs its defaultproperties imported

flags.label: CLASS_HasComponents
flags.comment: Class has component properties.

flags.label: CLASS_Hidden
flags.comment: Don't show this class in the editor class browser or edit inline new menus.

flags.label: CLASS_Deprecated
flags.comment: Don't save objects of this class when serializing

flags.label: CLASS_HideDropDown
flags.comment: Class not shown in editor drop down for class selection

flags.label: CLASS_Exported
flags.comment: Class has been exported to a header file

flags.label: CLASS_Intrinsic
flags.comment: Class has no unrealscript counter-part

flags.label: CLASS_NativeOnly
flags.comment: Properties in this class can only be accessed from native code

flags.label: CLASS_PerObjectLocalized
flags.comment: Handle object localization on a per-object basis, rather than per-class.

flags.label: CLASS_HasCrossLevelRefs
flags.comment: This class has properties that are marked with CPF_CrossLevel

flags.label: CLASS_IsAUProperty
flags.comment: deprecated - these values now match the values of the EClassCastFlags enum

flags.label: CLASS_IsAUObjectProperty
flags.comment: deprecated - these values now match the values of the EClassCastFlags enum

flags.label: CLASS_IsAUBoolProperty
flags.comment: deprecated - these values now match the values of the EClassCastFlags enum

flags.label: CLASS_IsAUState
flags.comment: deprecated - these values now match the values of the EClassCastFlags enum

flags.label: CLASS_IsAUFunction
flags.comment: deprecated - these values now match the values of the EClassCastFlags enum

flags.label: CLASS_IsAUStructProperty
flags.comment: deprecated - these values now match the values of the EClassCastFlags enum
